cmt#Meta-Reviewer: The Meta-Reviewer is the parent of the Reviewer. The reviewer is also the parent of the document which is the child of Meta-Review. The document is the child of Meta-Review and the reviewer is the parent of Review.
cmt#Reviewer: Meta-Reviewer and Meta-Reviewer are both children of Paper and Document. The review was written by the reviewer and has been assigned to it.
cmt#Decision: Rejection is the parent of the decision which is the child of Acceptance and the child of Rejection.
cmt#Person: Meta-Reviewer is a co-author of Meta-Review. The reviewer is the child of Meta-Review and is the child of Meta-Review. The reviewer is the child of Meta-Review and is the child of the ConferenceMember. The ConferenceChair is the parent of the ConferenceMember and the reviewer is the child of the Reviewer.
cmt#Document: Review is the parent of Document which is a child of both Paper and Document.
cmt#Preference: The following table shows the percentage of people who are enrolled in the program.
cmt#ProgramCommittee: The ProgramCommittee is the parent of ConferenceMember which is a member of the Conference. It was added by the Administrator and is the parent of Thing. PrintHardcopyMailingManifests is also a part of the Conference.
cmt#Bid: Reviewer is the child of Meta-Reviewer and PaperAbstract. PaperAbstract is a document that is parented to Paper. It is also the child of Reviewer who has the mark ConflictOfInterest.
cmt#Conference: Conference is the parent of Thing.
cmt#ConferenceChair: The ConferenceChair is the equivalent of the Chairman.
cmt#ConferenceMember: The ConferenceMember is the parent of the ProgramCommitteeMember. The ProgramCommitteeChair is the parent of the ProgramCommitteeMember. The Chairman is the parent of the ConferenceChair.
cmt#ProgramCommitteeMember: ProgramCommitteeMember is a member of the ProgramCommittee. It is the parent of the ProgramCommitteeChair who is the equivalent of the Chairman.
cmt#AuthorNotReviewer: AuthorNotReviewer is the parent of Paper which has the subject area of the subject. It is also the child of Review and is the parent of submitPaper. Co-author and co-writePaper are co-authors of Paper.
cmt#SubjectArea: The following table shows the percentage of people who are enrolled in the program.
cmt#ExternalReviewer: ExternalReviewer is a parent of Person who is a member of the ConferenceMember. The User is a child of the ConferenceMember and the ExternalReviewer is a parent of the User.
cmt#Chairman: Reviewer is the parent of the ConferenceMember and the Meta-Reviewer. The reviewer is the parent of the PaperAbstract and the Document. The reviewer is the parent of the Document and the ConferenceMember is the parent of the Chairman. The user is the child of the document which has ConflictOfInterest.
cmt#ProgramCommitteeChair: The ProgramCommitteeChair is the equivalent of the Chairman. Review is the parent of Meta-Review and Paper. It is also the parent of Meta-Review and also of the document readByMeta-Reviewer.
cmt#Acceptance: Acceptance is the parent of Decision and Rejection is the child of Rejection.
cmt#Rejection: Rejection is the parent of Decision and Acceptance. Acceptance is the child of Decision and Acceptance is the parent of Decision.
cmt#Review: Meta-Review is the parent of Meta-Review.
cmt#Paper: Paper is the parent of Document and Review. Document is also the parent of Document.
cmt#Author: The PaperFullVersion is a review document. It was created by the ProgramCommitteeMember and is the parent of the ConferenceMember. The co-author of the document is also the co-author of the paper. The ConflictOfInterest is a child of the ProgramCommitteeMember.
cmt#User: The AuthorNotReviewer is the parent of the ConferenceMember and the co-author of PaperAbstract. The Reviewer is the parent of the Meta-Reviewer. The AuthorNotReviewer is the co-author of PaperAbstract and is the parent of the ConferenceMember. The Administrator of the ProgramCommitteeMember is the author of the PaperAbstract.
cmt#Co-author: PaperFullVersion and PaperAbstract are both published by the ConferenceMember. The ConferenceMember is the parent of the ConferenceChair and the ProgramCommitteeMember. The Co-author is the parent of the ConferenceMember and the mark ConflictOfInterest is the author of the paper.
cmt#PaperAbstract: PaperAbstract is the parent of both Paper and Meta-Review. PaperFullVersion and Review are both children of Paper.
cmt#PaperFullVersion: The PaperFullVersion is the parent of the Paper which was rejectedBy. The Administrator is the parent of the Author and the User.
cmt#Administrator: The administrator is the parent of the user who has ConflictOfInterest. The user is the child of the administrator and the document is the child of the review document.
cmt#Meta-Review: Meta-Review is the parent of Review which is written by the Reviewer. The Administrator is the parent of the Reviewer and the User is the parent of the Reviewer.
